newsitem.title: INDIA: India 96/97 edible oil output seen at 6.7 mln T.
newsitem.headline: India 96/97 edible oil output seen at 6.7 mln T.

text.p: India's edible oil output in the 1996/97 (November-October) oil year is expected to be 6.7 million tonnes compared with an estimated 6.57 million tonnes in 1995/96, the Civil Supplies Ministry said on Thursday.
The ministry said in its annual report edible oil imports in 1996/97 were expected to total 1.35 million tonnes.
The Central Organisation of Oil Industry and Trade has forecast domestic edible oil output in 1996/97 at 6.7 million tonnes and imports at 1.4-1.5 million tonnes in the same period.
